name: Killing Nightmare
description:
Description-

 For those who dare please challenge yourself to Killing Nightmare, a game where the odds are stacked against the you, the enemies defy what is normal to try and eliminate you and the only thing you know is how many times you die. Killing Nightmare is a fantasy 2D platformer that is meant to kill you though unfair game design, hunting enemies and puzzling map layouts. The aim of this adventure is reach to find the lamp and active it to kill all the nightmares before making your way to the next level.

Features- 

         • Difficult platformer not for those with a faint heart
         • Quick character movements for evading enemies
         • 3 levels of increasing difficulty
         • A variety of Nightmares to escape from
         • Death is your only score to beat
         • Timing your jumps is key to your survival

P.S. This is the first Alpha of Killing Nightmare as such it is not free from bugs so there will be issue with the game, but I hope you enjoy all the same.
